ValidationRule.description: US-0008313 - [UK] FVF - Attach transactional data to record - BCD file Block record field updates after status was changed to any other except New.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'New')), OR( ISCHANGED( Name ) , ISCHANGED( Credit_Total_Value__c ) , ISCHANGED( CurrencyIsoCode ) , ISCHANGED( End_date__c ) , ISCHANGED( Number_of_sellers__c ) , ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ) , ISCHANGED( Site__c ) , ISCHANGED( Start_date__c ) , ISCHANGED( BCD_created_date__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change submitted BCD record. Please contact your administrator.
